title: Ep214 Facebook Confessions
description:
This week, the gals log on to look up a couple of sinister slayings that were discovered in a pretty public way. Topics include a macabre garden, what your posts say about your psyche, and some hefty delusions of grandeur. Mix up a hurricane cocktail in your best novelty cup, resist the urge to post about your ex, and tune in for Facebook Confessions.

For a full list of show sponsors, visit www.wineandcrimepodcast.com/support
itunes:author: Wine & Crime Podcast
dc:creator: Wine & Crime Podcast
